name: Oh No! Ghosts
description:
This game is extremely scray.

"Oh No! Ghosts" is supposedly a horror game I tried to make in RPG Maker for halloween last year but didn't finish it in time. It takes less than an hour to beat (try speedrunning it!).

It features at least two(2) ghosts. I spend zero time and less effort on it.

You are Jimm the anime, a ghost finder. You must find ghosts while not being found by ghosts. Skeletons also. I have never even played a survival horror game.

Updated October 2016 to version 2.0000ooooh

-removed the jokes that even I didn't get, replaced them with VERY good jokes.

-updated credis

-one of the songs was copyrighted and also became a meme since the original release, so now it's replaced.
